testcase.name: Check login is unsuccessfull with invalid mobilenumber - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given Chrome is opened and apollo247 app is opened..........................passed When User navigate on landing page..........................................passed Then Fields on navigation page are visible to the user......................passed When User clicks on login button............................................passed Then User enters invalid "0000000000" mobile number.........................passed Then User should get the invalid mobile error text on console...............passed

testcase.name: Check login is unsuccessfull with invalid otp - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given Chrome is opened and apollo247 app is opened..........................passed When User navigate on landing page..........................................passed Then Fields on navigation page are visible to the user......................passed When User clicks on login button............................................passed Then User enters valid "8078632273" mobile number...........................passed When User click on arrow button.............................................passed When User enters invalid OTP "000000".......................................passed Then User should get the invalid OTP error text on console..................passed
